title: Surreal Material Item Definitions
description: Building materials for generative cities from GENERATIVE_CITIES_SPEC.md. Includes 71 unique materials with special properties, acquisition methods, and magic system integration.

material.aestheticDescription: Pulsing pink-red flesh brick with visible veins, warm to touch, occasionally twitches
Spongy mushroom cap material, bioluminescent glow in darkness, earthy smell
Living timber with growing branches, bark walls, leaves still sprouting
Malleable terracotta, hand-molded surfaces, organic shapes, earthy red-brown

material.transmutation: extinguishes without fuel, spreads uncontrollably
material.aestheticDescription: Living flames, crackling sounds, orange-red glow, intense heat, trailing smoke
Brass gears constantly ticking, rotating buildings, spring-powered mechanisms

material.transmutation: melts into syrup in heat, dissolves in water
material.aestheticDescription: Rainbow-colored crystallized sugar, translucent, sweet smell

material.transmutation: melts into liquid chocolate in heat
material.aestheticDescription: Dark brown chocolate, rich aroma, smooth surface

material.transmutation: dissolves instantly in bright light, becomes intangible
material.aestheticDescription: Pure black liquid, absorbs all light, cold to touch, whispers of darkness
Impossible geometry, shifting colors between blue and purple, unstable form

material.transmutation: dissipates in silence, resonates in sound
material.aestheticDescription: Visible sound waves frozen in crystalline form, constant humming, vibrations
Translucent scenes frozen inside, touch to experience memory, slowly fading
Gray granite, carved surfaces, weathered textures, ancient and enduring
Polished steel, riveted plates, brass fittings, iron beams, metallic echoes
Brilliant facets, rainbow refraction, unbreakable hardness, blinding light

material.transmutation: collapses without support, blown away by wind
material.aestheticDescription: Golden dunes, shifting textures, granular, wind-carved patterns

material.transmutation: melts into water, refreezes in cold
material.aestheticDescription: Translucent blue-white ice, icicle formations, frost patterns, slippery
Transparent walls, prismatic light reflections, mirrors everywhere, fragile

material.transmutation: burns in fire, dissolves in water
material.aestheticDescription: Origami buildings, written words everywhere, paper lanterns, rustling sounds
Geometric formations, rainbow light, constant humming, vibrations
White calcium structures, ossified architecture, marrow-filled chambers

material.transmutation: disperses in wind, condenses in calm
material.aestheticDescription: Gray wisps, swirling patterns, semi-tangible, acrid smell
Orange-brown corrosion, flaking surfaces, metallic decay, industrial rot
Shimmering fabric, flowing drapes, soft textures, delicate strength
Golden-orange translucence, preserved insects inside, warm glow, ancient feel

material.transmutation: dissolves in rain, corrodes metal
material.aestheticDescription: White crystals, cubic formations, preserving properties, sharp salty taste

material.transmutation: melts into liquid, hardens when cool
material.aestheticDescription: Honeycomb patterns, yellow-white color, waxy smell, smooth surfaces
Black carbon, shiny surfaces, fuel potential, sooty residue
Sickly green crystals, noxious fumes, deadly to touch, warning colors
White glazed surfaces, hand-painted patterns, delicate strength, shatters easily
Colorful polyps, underwater growth, calcium carbonate, living ecosystem

material.transmutation: evaporates in heat, flows without containment
material.aestheticDescription: Liquid walls, flowing surfaces, reflective ripples, constant motion
Silvery-white metal with faint blue moonlight glow, incredibly light yet stronger than steel
Jet black metal with metallic sheen, rings like a bell when struck, nearly indestructible
Red-gold metal, warm to touch, pulses with contained magical energy
Dark gray metal with iridescent shimmer and tiny star-like sparkles inside

material.transmutation: decays slowly in darkness, requires starlight exposure
material.aestheticDescription: Liquid silver-white light that flows like water, illuminates without heat
Absolute black that absorbs all light, creates visual distortion, whispers of nothingness
Iridescent scales in various colors, warm to touch with faint heartbeat sensation
Golden-orange ash that glows with inner fire, warm to touch, never fully extinguishes
Brown-black hard shell with segmented plates and organic patterns

material.transmutation: fades in daylight, phases through solid matter
material.aestheticDescription: Translucent green-white mist with cold vapor trails and whispers
Pearlescent white-blue gemstone, internal light shifts like moon phases
Orange-gold crystal with internal flame-like patterns, emits warm glow
Deep red gemstone with black specks, seems perpetually wet, pulses like heartbeat
Clear crystal with rainbow fractures, creates magic-dead zones around it

material.transmutation: flows and reforms constantly, toxic fumes
material.aestheticDescription: Silver liquid metal in constant motion, perfectly reflective, toxic vapors

material.transmutation: unstable form, reality distortion
material.aestheticDescription: Shifting colors with crackling energy, unstable physical form, bends reality
Dense dark purple-black stone, warps space visibly, objects orbit it slowly

material.transmutation: flickers between dimensions, semi-tangible
material.aestheticDescription: Translucent crystal that flickers in and out of reality, exists in superposition
Glowing green-blue gel with pulsing light, sticky texture
Red crystalline stone with warm glow, reality ripples around it

material.transmutation: shape-shifts into any form, remembers shapes
material.aestheticDescription: Gray amorphous blob constantly shifting, absorbs and mimics colors

material.transmutation: non-linear aging, temporal distortions
material.aestheticDescription: Silver-gold metal with rippling temporal distortions, ages paradoxically
Jet black volcanic glass with mirror finish and razor-sharp edges
Wood grain pattern preserved in stone, earth tones, ancient historical feel
Green creeping vines with flowers, grows continuously when planted

material.transmutation: grows 10 tiles/hour, covers buildings overnight, spreads to neighbors
material.aestheticDescription: Thick green vines growing impossibly fast, strangling coverage, flowers everywhere

material.transmutation: explodes when disturbed, chain reactions possible, spreads spores
material.aestheticDescription: Glowing orange-red mushrooms with pulsing light, sizzling sound before detonation

material.transmutation: converts organic matter to crystal, spreads via airborne spores, irreversible
material.aestheticDescription: White-blue crystalline growth spreading like frost, sparkles, preserves shapes inside

material.transmutation: infectious rust spreads between metal, airborne transmission, metal crumbles in days
material.aestheticDescription: Orange-brown spreading corrosion, flaking metal, structural groans, iron decay smell

material.transmutation: sticks to everything on contact, spreads via touch, never fully dries
material.aestheticDescription: Translucent goop, webs of slime between objects, squelching sounds, sticky mess

material.transmutation: sentient paint that moves, creates art autonomously, changes based on mood
material.aestheticDescription: Shifting flowing colors, self-updating murals, walls that breathe and pulse

material.transmutation: walls gossip about witnessed events, spreads secrets, records everything
material.aestheticDescription: Faint whispers always audible, walls lean in conspiratorially, echoing conversations

material.transmutation: falls upward, pulls nearby objects up, escapes to sky if untethered
material.aestheticDescription: Stone that drifts upward continuously, must be tethered or lost forever

material.transmutation: simultaneously solid and liquid, exists and doesn't exist, heavy and weightless
material.aestheticDescription: Looks different from every angle, can't focus eyes on it, causes dizziness and headaches

material.transmutation: different parts age at different rates, grows and decays simultaneously
material.aestheticDescription: Rings show impossible age patterns, bark peels and regrows at once, seedlings from ancient wood

material.transmutation: constantly emits musical tones, can't be silenced, harmonizes with other singing metal
material.aestheticDescription: Metallic humming and singing, vibrates constantly, creates ambient music

material.transmutation: emits laughing gas passively, makes everyone nearby laugh uncontrollably
material.aestheticDescription: Pink-purple crystals with sparkles, giggling sounds emanate, can't look without smiling

material.transmutation: brings terrible luck, accidents increase, relationships fail, can't get rid of it
material.aestheticDescription: Gleaming gold almost too shiny, feels wrong to touch, bad vibes, subtle wrongness

material.transmutation: slowly consumes adjacent materials, grows as it eats, prefers valuable materials
material.aestheticDescription: Gray stone with darker patches, veins spread to adjacent materials, dissolving effect

material.transmutation: shapeshifts to look like other materials, reverts randomly, fools inspection
material.aestheticDescription: Looks like whatever it mimics, occasional shimmer breaks illusion, feels slightly off
